thread.title: 7 Colourful Instagram Accounts You Should Definitely Be Following
thread.title_full: 7 Colourful Instagram Accounts You Should Definitely Be Following

author: Tolani Shoneye
title: 7 Colourful Instagram Accounts You Should Definitely Be Following
text:
View this image › 
Instagram: @cynthianyongesa Cynthia’a Instagram page is almost too perfect. She does that three pictures in a roll that all the cool Instagrammers do, and she does it so well. Her page is definitely worth a follow and all the likes.
ID: 10634806 2. @Hol_fox View this image › 
Instagram: @hol_fox Holly Fox is a baker and an graphic designer, which is clear when your see her page. She makes colourful cookies that look also too good to eat.
ID: 10634720 3. @LittleDrill View this image › 
Instagram: @littledrill Shelby Edwards has this whole Instagram thing sussed out. Her page is fun, quirky and absolutely adorable.
ID: 10634679 4. @Cestmaria View this image › 
Instagram: @cestmaria Maria is a photographer from London, and her page is so beautifully calming. It is a pastel lovers dream.
ID: 10634750 5. @ThePinkerPrint View this image › 
Instagram: @www.instagram.com/thepinkerprint/?hl=en Dedicated to all things pink, this page run by writer Chimmy is so bloody good. The pictures are great but the captions are so much better.
ID: 10634700 6. @Xuzzi View this image › 
Instagram: @xuzzi Another ode to the colour pink. This pretty pink feed actually cheers me up every time I look at it.
ID: 10634724 7. @Splendid_rags View this image › 
Instagram: @splendid_rags Leslie is a fashion blogger who wears the best colour outfits. Alongside her outfit posts she shares fun quotes and plenty of cheap fashion finds.
ID: 10634773 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
Tolani Shoneye is a beauty and lifestyle writer for BuzzFeed and is based in London.
